metadata.title: CVE-2014-5267 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
modules/openid/xrds.inc in Drupal 6.x before 6.33 and 7.x before 7.31allows remote attackers to have unspecified impact via a crafted DOCTYPEdeclaration in an XRDS document.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-5267` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

drupal7 - 7.32-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.32-1').
